GNBCUCPFunction.description: Represents the logical function CU-CP of gNB and en-gNB.

configurable5QISetRef.description: DN of the Configurable5QISet that the GNBCUCPFunction supports (is associated to).

dynamic5QISetRef.description: DN of the Dynamic5QISet that the GNBCUCPFunction supports (is associated to).

gNBCUName.description: Identifies the Central Unit of an gNB.

gNBId.description: Identifies a gNB within a PLMN. The gNB Identifier (gNB ID) is part of the NR Cell Identifier (NCI) of the gNB cells.

gNBIdLength.description: Indicates the number of bits for encoding the gNB ID.

pLMNId.description: The PLMN identifier to be used as part of the global RAN node identity.
